section.name: v_2_11_0
section.item:
The spellbook has been updated to include spells from the following sourcebooks:

• Acquisitions Incorporated
• Explorer\'s Guide to Wildemount
• Lost Laboratory of Kwalish
• Rime of the Frostmaiden

section.name: v_2_12_0
section.item:
The spellbook has been updated to include spells from Fizban\'s Treasury of Dragons.

Typos and minor errors in several spells have been corrected.

section.name: v_2_13_0
section.item: The spellbook has been updated to include spells from Strixhaven: A Curriculum of Chaos.

section.name: v_2_13_1
section.item: The spellbook has been updated to include spells from the Astral Adventurer\'s Guide.

section.name: v_3_0_0
section.item: This update adds the ability to keep track of spell slots for each character.

section.name: v_3_1_0
section.item: This update adds a button to the spell slots screen to regain all slots.

section.name: v_3_4_0
section.item:
The spellbook has been updated with the following new features:

• The ability to filter spells by royalty has been added.

• The count for each spell list is now shown next to the list name in both the side menu and the bottom navigation bar.

Additionally, this update fixes some typos and mistakes in the text for a few spells.

section.name: v_3_5_0
section.item:
The spellbook has been updated with the following new features:

• Content from The Book of Many Things has been added.

• The higher level text for Erupting Earth has been corrected.

• The spellcasting information has been updated with a description of the royalty component.
